item.title: My First Database Column Rename (aka Renaming Database Columns Safely)
item.description: My Big Break I had always wanted to break into contributing code and I finally found some low hanging fruit on Exercism. I made a small change, got some feedback and “squashed” my commits. Soon after, I wanted a bit larger of a project to work on so I found this issue. The task seemed fairly straightforward: Rename a database column called mastery to track_mentor. A Add a route (kind of like a controller and a route in Rails but… Sinatra).
